ComicInfo.Title: Life On Mars
ComicInfo.Summary: Thomas, a blind telepath, recruits Felicia to work with him at the Mars Corporation. Mars is a huge global conglomerate, with their dirty fingers in a lot of pies, most notably the emerging field of nation-building. With her unique talent - able to get to anyone, anywhere - Mars is looking to turn Felicia into an assassin capable of paving the way for new business opportunities.
